atlantic.title: Why Obama Won't Talk About Islamic Terrorism
atlantic.topComment: I usually appreciate Mr Frum, but he completely missed the point in this essay. The reason this Administration, and any responsible administration, including Dubya's with a few lapses, consistently underplays the Islamic roots and emphasizes the mino...
